Based on the knowledge provided and the cards from the Sampler, here’s my assessment:

1. ♦8 (D8) is in Tier A, which gives it the highest score.
2. ♦10 (D10) is a red card but not in the top tiers, so it will have a lower score.
3. ♥10 (H10) is also a red card but not in the top tiers.
4. ♥9 (H9) is another red card but still not in the top tiers.
5. ♣8 (C8) and ♣9 (C9) are black cards and will score lower.
6. ♠7 (S7) is a black card and will score lower.
7. ♠11 (S11) and ♠12 (S12) are black cards and will score lower.
8. ♦7 (D7) is not present, but I can consider the next best options.

Given this analysis, I will prioritize D8 and include D10 and H10 as secondary options. The rest will be less frequent selections.
